sentence.Network_en: He is generally rated Italy's No. 3 industrialist.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被公认为意大利第三大实业家。

sentence.Network_en: Following the local industrialist on the appointments list is the physics laureate.
sentence.Network_cn: 预约名单上排在本地实业家后面的是一位获奖物理学家.

sentence.Network_en: Also waiting in the cloning lab this morning is the local industrialist.
sentence.Network_cn: 这天早上同时在实验室等候的还有一位本地的实业家.

list.abs: For now , however , German industrialists have plenty of reasons to be cheerful ., 但就目前而言 , 德国工业家有充足的理由感到乐观.
wealthy and powerful landowner or industrialist ., 有财有势的地主或工业家.
some industrialists are at heart ardent reformers .有些企业家实际上都是热心的改革家。
some great industrialists , like Henry Ford , stick around eventhe world moves on and their powers fail .一些伟大的实业家，像亨利福特，无孔不入地营销，任凭世事无常。

entry.def: An industrialist is a powerful businessman who owns or controls large industrial companies or factories.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who manages or has significant financial interest in an industrial enterprise

Sentence.sentence: The British industrialist James Louis, held by kidnappers in Central Africa for the past 8 months, was released unharmed yesterday.
What happened to British industrialist James Louis

sentences.en: The government has set up a committee of industrialists and academics to advise it.
sentences.cn: 政府已成立了一个实业家和学者的委员会来为其提供建议。

sentences.en: This deal will offer major benefits to industrialists and investors.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易将会让实业家和投资者受益匪浅。
